original_text: Some people called the Emites and the Anakites, ‘ Rephaites ’. But the people from Moab called them ‘Emites’.
korean_text: 그들을 아낙 족속과 같이 르바임이라 불렀으나 모압 사람은 그들을 에밈이라 불렀으며

sentences.original_text: Some people called the Emites and the Anakites
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 에밋 족과 아낙 족을

sentences.original_text: But the people from Moab called them
